auth.registerSubtitle: Create your account and start expanding your network.

auth.description: 323 Network connects Brazilians in the United States who seek business opportunities, strategic partnerships, and professional growth. We act as a relationship and business hub, creating an environment where qualified connections drive projects, companies, and the construction of the American Dream.

hero.subtitle: 323 Network connects Brazilians in the United States seeking business opportunities, strategic partnerships, and professional growth. We act as a relationship and business hub, creating an environment where qualified connections drive projects, companies, and the construction of the American Dream.

about.description: We are a dynamic ecosystem connecting influential voices from the Brazilian community in the United States. For over a decade, we've been promoting connections that transform careers and businesses.

whatWeDo.title: What We Offer
whatWeDo.description: A complete experience for Brazilians seeking growth in the United States.

events.title: Exclusive Events
events.description: High-level networking, inspiring talks, and hands-on workshops with top professionals.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Genuine connections with entrepreneurs, artists, and professionals who share your goals.

opportunities.title: Opportunities
opportunities.description: Access to exclusive jobs, business partnerships, and specialized services for Brazilians.

benefits.title: VIP Benefits
benefits.description: Exclusive discounts on services, early access, and perks reserved for members.

events.title: Events that Matter
events.description: In-person and online experiences that connect, inspire, and transform.

portfolio.description: Relive the best moments from our events and gatherings.

benefits.title: Member Benefits
benefits.description: Much more than networking. A complete experience for your success.

networking.title: Strategic Networking
networking.description: Connect directly with successful professionals and influential entrepreneurs.

events.title: Exclusive Events
events.description: Priority access and special discounts on all network events.

discounts.title: Partner Discounts
discounts.description: Exclusive benefits from selected partner services.

content.title: Premium Content
content.description: Access to mentorships, recorded workshops, and exclusive materials.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Concierge team to help with your needs.

badge.title: Verified Badge
badge.description: Member seal that increases your credibility in the community.

cta.title: Ready to join?
cta.description: Join thousands of Brazilians who are growing together.

testimonials.title: What Our Members Say
testimonials.description: Real stories from Brazilians who transformed their careers with 323 Network.

cta.description: Join a community that truly cares about your success. Quality networking, exclusive events, and opportunities that make a difference.

footer.description: Connecting Brazilians and transforming careers in the United States since 2014.

hero.title: Become a Partner of
hero.subtitle: 323 Network
hero.description: Connecting brands to the Brazilian community in the United States

about.title: Who is 323 Network
about.description1: 323 Network is a connection network between Brazilian artists, entrepreneurs, and professionals in the United States, focused on community building, business opportunities, and brand visibility.
about.description2: We organize in-person events and exclusive experiences in various US cities, connecting Brazilians with high purchasing power, university education, and interest in professional and financial growth in the country.

artists.title: Curated Artists and Speakers
artists.description: Curated artists and speakers connected to the Brazilian community.

events.title: Recurring Events
events.description: Recurring events for groups of 50 to 200 people in selected venues.

projects.title: Exclusive Projects
projects.description: Projects like American Dream, designed for Brazilians with university degrees who live or want to live in the USA.

content.title: Continuous Content
content.description: Continuous content on social media, focusing on real stories, education, art, and opportunities.

events.title: 323 Network Events
events.description: See how we connect the Brazilian community through unique experiences
events.noEvents: No events available at the moment

gallery.title: Our Events in Action
gallery.description: See how we connect the Brazilian community in Los Angeles through unique experiences
gallery.noImages: No images available at the moment

videos.title: Video Portfolio
videos.description: Watch the best moments from our events and talks
videos.noVideos: No videos available at the moment

benefits.title: Why Sponsor 323 Network Show?
benefits.subtitle: American Dream
benefits.description: Reach a qualified, engaged audience with high conversion potential

attention.title: Attention (Media Reach)
attention.description: Instagram, YouTube, X, etc. Total reach: 10M now. Projected: 50M next quarter, 100M next year (label as projection/target, not current).

access.title: Access (Events)
access.description: 2-3 events/week. 50-100 attendees/event. These are mentees (high intent, not random audience).

immersion.title: Immersion (3-Day Field Trips / Site Visits)
immersion.description: This is a premium sponsorship category by itself: Sponsor gets 3 days of repeated exposure. Content opportunities (daily recap clips, interviews, behind-the-scenes).

authority.title: Authority (Partner Universities/Colleges)
authority.description: This is your trust engine. Sponsors love proximity to institutions.

plans.title: Sponsorship Plans
plans.description: Choose the ideal plan for your brand to connect with the Brazilian community in the USA

start.title: START
start.goal: Goal: be present and seen consistently.

features.logo: Logo on all 323 event artwork as an Official Partner
features.post: 1 feed post per month mentioning the brand
features.stories: 2 story sequences per month with tagging and link
features.website: Inclusion in the partners list on the website

grow.title: GROW
grow.goal: Goal: brand recognition and lead generation.

features.dedicated: 1 dedicated post per month presenting the brand and offer
features.mention: Verbal mention at all in-person events during the period
features.qr: Sponsor QR code / link on slides and event materials
features.offer: 1 exclusive offer sent to event participants

impact.title: IMPACT
impact.goal: Goal: deep relationship, leads, and measurable results.

features.video: Co-creation of 1 video content per month with 323 artist/mentor
features.speaking: 3-5 minutes speaking time at least 1 key event
features.report: Simple performance report: reach, engagement, and clicks

namingRights.title: Want to Be the Main Brand?
namingRights.description: For brands that want an even stronger presence, we offer the possibility of Naming Rights:
namingRights.benefit1: Associate your brand name with a project, event cycle, or 323 program
namingRights.benefit3: Exclusive actions designed with your marketing team
namingRights.cta: I want to discuss Naming Rights

cta.title: Ready to build something meaningful together?
cta.subtitle: Let's create something amazing
cta.description: If your brand wants to connect with Brazilians in the United States strategically, authentically, and consistently, 323 Network is the right partner.

premium.description: Become a Premium member to unlock exclusive features, gain authority, and connect with Brazilians worldwide.

subscriptions.canceledNotice: Checkout canceled. You can try again whenever you want.

whatIs.a: It is our premium plan for those who want to have more visibility and credibility within 323 Network, whether to offer services or to stand out as a professional in the community.

benefits.q: What are the real benefits of the highlight?
benefits.a: Premium members appear at the top of professional lists and have a visual badge that generates more trust for those seeking services or connections on the platform.

cancel.a: You can cancel at any time directly through your billing panel. Access to benefits remains active until the end of the monthly cycle already paid.
